00096 {

00102 } l4_buf_regs_t;

00113 typedef struct l4_thread_regs_t
00114 {
00116   l4_umword_t  error;
00118   l4_timeout_t xfer;
00120   l4_umword_t  user[3];
00121 } l4_thread_regs_t;

00299 L4_INLINE l4_msg_regs_t *l4_utcb_mr_u(l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00300 { return (l4_msg_regs_t*)((char*)u + L4_UTCB_MSG_REGS_OFFSET); }
00301 
00302 L4_INLINE l4_buf_regs_t *l4_utcb_br_u(l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00303 { return (l4_buf_regs_t*)((char*)u + L4_UTCB_BUF_REGS_OFFSET); }
00304 
00305 L4_INLINE l4_thread_regs_t *l4_utcb_tcr_u(l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00306 { return (l4_thread_regs_t*)((char*)u + L4_UTCB_THREAD_REGS_OFFSET); }
00307 
00308 L4_INLINE l4_exc_regs_t *l4_utcb_exc_u(l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00309 { return (l4_exc_regs_t*)((char*)u + L4_UTCB_MSG_REGS_OFFSET); }
00310 
00311 L4_INLINE void l4_utcb_inherit_fpu_u(l4_utcb_t *u, int switch_on) L4_NOTHROW
00312 {
00313   if (switch_on)
00314     l4_utcb_br_u(u)->bdr |= L4_UTCB_INHERIT_FPU;
00315   else
00316     l4_utcb_br_u(u)->bdr &= ~L4_UTCB_INHERIT_FPU;
00317 }
00318 
00319 L4_INLINE l4_utcb_t *l4_utcb(void) L4_NOTHROW
00320 {
00321 #ifdef L4SYS_USE_UTCB_WRAP
00322   return l4_utcb_wrap();
00323 #else
00324   return l4_utcb_direct();
00325 #endif
00326 }
00327 
00328 
00329 
00330 
00331 L4_INLINE l4_msg_regs_t *l4_utcb_mr(void) L4_NOTHROW
00332 { return l4_utcb_mr_u(l4_utcb()); }
00333 
00334 L4_INLINE l4_buf_regs_t *l4_utcb_br(void) L4_NOTHROW
00335 { return l4_utcb_br_u(l4_utcb()); }
00336 
00337 L4_INLINE l4_thread_regs_t *l4_utcb_tcr(void) L4_NOTHROW
00338 { return l4_utcb_tcr_u(l4_utcb()); }
00339 
00340 L4_INLINE l4_exc_regs_t *l4_utcb_exc(void) L4_NOTHROW
00341 { return l4_utcb_exc_u(l4_utcb()); }
00342 
00343 L4_INLINE void l4_utcb_inherit_fpu(int switch_on) L4_NOTHROW
00344 { l4_utcb_inherit_fpu_u(l4_utcb(), switch_on); }
00345 
00346 L4_INLINE
00347 l4_timeout_s l4_timeout_abs_u(l4_kernel_clock_t val, int pos,
00348                               l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00349 {
00350   l4_timeout_s to;
00351   to.t = 0x8000 | pos;
00352   *(l4_kernel_clock_t*)((char*)(l4_utcb_br_u(utcb)->br + pos)) = val;
00353   return to;
00354 }
00355 
00356 L4_INLINE
00357 l4_timeout_s l4_timeout_abs(l4_kernel_clock_t val, int pos) L4_NOTHROW
00358 { return l4_timeout_abs_u(val, pos, l4_utcb()); }
00359 
00360 __END_DECLS
